page.title: 09Education
page.content: {Education { }Flockton school, a 5-10 First school, is dated 1696, but it is known that one existed earlier in the village. Written records go back to 1864 in the present school, and during 1984-85 improvements costing some Â£120,000 have been made to the school to give the children more modern facilities. The majority of children in the remaining villages attend schools not in this block as Netherton and Middlestown Junior and Infant schools are just out of this area, and the older children attend Horbury Comprehensive.
